Kọleji nke Mmụta Nwafor Orizu dị na steeti Anambra, Naijiria hiwere na 1976
A na-akpọbu ya Kọleji nke Mmụta Nsugbe
Akpọrọ ya aha onye isi oche onye isi ala nke abụọ nke Naijiria, Abyssinia Akweke Nwafor Orizu.
Na Julaị 12, 2018, Dr Tony Nwoye kwadoro ụgwọ maka nkwalite kọleji agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Mmụta Federal.
